thread.title: What fun! Akshay-Twinkle and Hrithik-Sussanne enjoy a triple date

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: What fun! Akshay-Twinkle and Hrithik-Sussanne enjoy a triple date
text:
Happy troopers #easylikesundaymorning ðÂÂÂðÂÂÂðÂ¦ÂðÂÂÂâÂºï¸Â 
A photo posted by Sussanne Khan (@suzkr) onFeb 5, 2017 at 5:18am PST
 
Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna met up with Hrithik Roshan and his ex-wife Sussanne Khan, Gayatri Joshi and her husband Vikas Oberoi and enjoyed a Sunday filled with fun and laughter!
Twinkle Khanna and Sussanne Khan shared a snapshot from their day out on Instagram. While Twinkle wrote, "A Sunday filled with laughter and sunshine #treehuggers," Sussanne captioned the picture, "Happy troopers #easylikesundaymorning"
The gang also watched Akshay Kumar's upcoming film 'Jolly LLB' in Mumbai.
Photos: Akshay, Twinkle and Hrithik, Sussanne watch 'Jolly LLB 2' 

 
Also read:  Bombay HC orders four cuts, fresh certification for 'Jolly LLB 2'
